verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> Now when these things were done אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these נִגְּשׁ֨וּ <S%H5066><s%> came אֵלַ֤י <S%H413><s%> about הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> the princes לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to me saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not נִבְדְּל֞וּ <S%H914><s%> have not separated הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> The people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites מֵעַמֵּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> themselves from the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the lands כְּ֠תוֹעֲבֹֽתֵיהֶם <S%H8441><s%> [doing] according to their abominations לַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <S%H3669><s%> [even] of the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֜י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittites הַפְּרִזִּ֣י <S%H6522><s%> the Perizzites הַיְבוּסִ֗י <S%H2983><s%> the Jebusites הָֽעַמֹּנִי֙ <S%H5984><s%> the Ammonites הַמֹּ֣אָבִ֔י <S%H4125><s%> the Moabites הַמִּצְרִ֖י <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptians וְהָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> For they have taken מִבְּנֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1323><s%> of their daughters לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> and for וְלִבְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1121><s%> for themselves and for their sons וְהִתְעָֽרְבוּ֙ <S%H6148><s%> have mingled זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> so that the holy בְּעַמֵּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> themselves with the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> of [those] lands וְיַ֧ד <S%H3027><s%> yea the hand הַשָּׂרִ֣ים <S%H8269><s%> of the princes וְהַסְּגָנִ֗ים <S%H5461><s%> and rulers הָ֥יְתָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> have been בַּמַּ֥עַל <S%H4604><s%> in this trespass הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this רִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> hath been chief ס

וּכְשָׁמְעִי֙ <S%H8085><s%> And when I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this קָרַ֥עְתִּי <S%H7167><s%> I rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדִ֖י <S%H899><s%> my garment וּמְעִילִ֑י <S%H4598><s%> and my mantle וָאֶמְרְטָ֞ה <S%H4803><s%> and plucked off מִשְּׂעַ֤ר <S%H8181><s%> the hair רֹאשִׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> of my head וּזְקָנִ֔י <S%H2206><s%> and of my beard וָאֵשְׁבָ֖ה <S%H3427><s%> and sat down מְשׁוֹמֵֽם׃ <S%H8074><s%> astonied

וְאֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> about יֵאָסְפ֗וּ <S%H622><s%> Then were assembled כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone חָרֵד֙ <S%H2730><s%> unto me every one that trembled בְּדִבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> at the words אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> account מַ֣עַל <S%H4604><s%> because of the transgression הַגּוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1473><s%> of those that had been carried away וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> and I sat מְשׁוֹמֵ֔ם <S%H8074><s%> astonied עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until לְמִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> sacrifice הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the evening

וּבְמִנְחַ֣ת <S%H4503><s%> sacrifice הָעֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And at the evening קַ֚מְתִּי <S%H6965><s%> I arose up מִתַּֽעֲנִיתִ֔י <S%H8589><s%> from my heaviness וּבְקָרְעִ֥י <S%H7167><s%> and having rent בִגְדִ֖י <S%H899><s%> my garment וּמְעִילִ֑י <S%H4598><s%> and my mantle וָֽאֶכְרְעָה֙ <S%H3766><s%> I fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בִּרְכַּ֔י <S%H1290><s%> upon my knees וָאֶפְרְשָׂ֥ה <S%H6566><s%> and spread out כַפַּ֖י <S%H3709><s%> my hands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

וָאֹמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> And said אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> O my God בֹּ֣שְׁתִּי <S%H954><s%> I am ashamed וְנִכְלַ֔מְתִּי <S%H3637><s%> and blush לְהָרִ֧ים <S%H7311><s%> to lift up אֱלֹהַ֛י <S%H430><s%> to thee my God פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> my face אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עֲוֹנֹתֵ֤ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> for our iniquities רָבוּ֙ <S%H7235><s%> are increased לְמַ֣עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> over רֹּ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [our] head וְאַשְׁמָתֵ֥נוּ <S%H819><s%> and our trespass גָדְלָ֖ה <S%H1431><s%> is grown up עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> even לַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> unto the heavens

מִימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> Since the days אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we בְּאַשְׁמָ֣ה <S%H819><s%> trespass גְדֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> [have] we [been] in a great עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וּבַעֲוֹנֹתֵ֡ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> and for our iniquities נִתַּ֡נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> been delivered אֲנַחְנוּ֩ <S%H587><s%> we מְלָכֵ֨ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> have we our kings כֹהֲנֵ֜ינוּ <S%H3548><s%> [and] our priests בְּיַ֣ד ׀ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings הָאֲרָצ֗וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the lands בַּחֶ֜רֶב <S%H2719><s%> to the sword בַּשְּׁבִ֧י <S%H7628><s%> to captivity וּבַבִּזָּ֛ה <S%H961><s%> and to a spoil וּבְבֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> and to confusion פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> of face כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> now כִּמְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> And now for a little רֶגַע֩ <S%H7281><s%> space הָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> has been תְחִנָּ֜ה <S%H8467><s%> grace מֵאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לְהַשְׁאִ֥יר <S%H7604><s%> to leave לָ֙נוּ֙ פְּלֵיטָ֔ה <S%H6413><s%> us a remnant to escape וְלָתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> and to give לָ֥נוּ יָתֵ֖ד <S%H3489><s%> us a nail בִּמְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> in his holy לְהָאִ֤יר <S%H215><s%> may lighten עֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5869><s%> our eyes אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> that our God וּלְתִתֵּ֛נוּ <S%H5414><s%> and give מִֽחְיָ֥ה <S%H4241><s%> reviving מְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> us a little בְּעַבְדֻתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5659><s%> in our bondage

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> For we [were] bondmen אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves וּבְעַבְדֻתֵ֔נוּ <S%H5659><s%> us in our bondage לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not עֲזָבָ֖נוּ <S%H5800><s%> hath not forsaken אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> yet our God וַֽיַּט־ <S%H5186><s%> but hath extended עָלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and חֶ֡סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> unto us in the sight מַלְכֵ֨י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings פָרַ֜ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> to give לָ֣נוּ מִֽחְיָ֗ה <S%H4241><s%> us a reviving לְרוֹמֵ֞ם <S%H7311><s%> to set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> of our God וּלְהַעֲמִ֣יד <S%H5975><s%> and to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָרְבֹתָ֔יו <S%H2723><s%> the desolations וְלָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> thereof and to give לָ֣נוּ גָדֵ֔ר <S%H1447><s%> us a wall בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem ס

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> Now מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what נֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> what shall we say אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> And now O our God אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עָזַ֖בְנוּ <S%H5800><s%> this? for we have forsaken מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4687><s%> thy commandments

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֗יתָ <S%H6680><s%> Which thou hast commanded בְּיַ֨ד <S%H3027><s%> by עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants הַנְּבִיאִים֮ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> unto which ye go לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land נִדָּה֙ <S%H5079><s%> it is an unclean הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּנִדַּ֖ת <S%H5079><s%> with the filthiness עַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the lands בְּתוֹעֲבֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8441><s%> with their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מִלְא֛וּהָ <S%H4390><s%> which have filled מִפֶּ֥ה <S%H6310><s%> it from one end אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> to another בְּטֻמְאָתָֽם׃ <S%H2932><s%> with their uncleanness

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> now בְּֽנוֹתֵיכֶ֞ם <S%H1323><s%> not your daughters אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> Now therefore give לִבְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> unto their sons וּבְנֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> their daughters אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> neither take לִבְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1121><s%> unto your sons וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and never תִדְרְשׁ֧וּ <S%H1875><s%> nor seek שְׁלֹמָ֛ם <S%H7965><s%> their peace וְטוֹבָתָ֖ם <S%H2896><s%> or their wealth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <S%H2388><s%> that ye may be strong וַאֲכַלְתֶּם֙ <S%H398><s%> and eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> the good הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֥ם <S%H3423><s%> and leave [it] for an inheritance לִבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> to your children עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וְאַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> And after כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> all that is come עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H4639><s%> deeds הָרָעִ֔ים <S%H7451><s%> upon us for our evil וּבְאַשְׁמָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H819><s%> trespass הַגְּדֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> and for our great כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> since אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> seeing that thou our God חָשַׂ֤כְתָּֽ <S%H2820><s%> hast punished לְמַ֙טָּה֙ <S%H4295><s%> us less מֵֽעֲוֹנֵ֔נוּ <S%H5771><s%> than our iniquities וְנָתַ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> [deserve] and hast given לָּ֛נוּ פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> us [such] deliverance כָּזֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> shall we

הֲנָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> Should we again לְהָפֵ֣ר <S%H6565><s%> break מִצְוֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H4687><s%> thy commandments וּ֨לְהִתְחַתֵּ֔ן <S%H2859><s%> and join in affinity בְּעַמֵּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> with the people הַתֹּעֵב֖וֹת <S%H8441><s%> Tolaites הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תֶֽאֱנַף־ <S%H599><s%> be angry בָּ֙נוּ֙ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to the point כַּלֵּ֔ה <S%H3615><s%> with us till thou hadst consumed לְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> [us] so that [there should be] no remnant וּפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <S%H6413><s%> deliverance פ

יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> thou [art] righteous אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׁאַ֥רְנוּ <S%H7604><s%> for we remain פְלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> yet escaped כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this הִנְנ֤וּ <S%H2005><s%> behold לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> behold we [are] before בְּאַשְׁמָתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H819><s%> thee in our trespasses כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no לַעֲמ֛וֹד <S%H5975><s%> for we cannot stand לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise פ
